#### Load the ratings data into a dataframe.
```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
movie_ratings_data <- read.csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/stephen-haslett/data612/master/movie_ratings.csv', header = TRUE, sep = ',', stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
colnames(movie_ratings_data) <- gsub('User', ' ', colnames(movie_ratings_data), fixed = TRUE)
colnames(movie_ratings_data) <- gsub('.', ' ', colnames(movie_ratings_data), fixed = TRUE)

```
